backend/main.mo: Defines actor-level data types for activities, reminders, finances, habits, journals, and user profiles with associated metadata and enums. No business logic is implemented; the file only declares structured types.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels. Used for tracking work on mobile pie chart overflow and finance trends chart sizing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing each frontend fileâ€™s purpose, behavior, and UI logic. Serves as a reference index for frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background, text, and border styles. Provides the OKLCH color system and shared UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point with root div and script loading main.tsx. Sets viewport and document title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling theme, authentication state, profile setup gating, date selection, and switching between daily and main dashboards. Renders header, footer, toasts, and responsive layouts.
frontend/src/components/AppButton.tsx: A wrapper around the UI Button component that injects a shared 'app-button' class. Ensures consistent button styling across the app.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Interactive monthly calendar with date navigation, today shortcut, and reminder indicators. Computes month layout and calls onDateSelect when a day is chosen.
frontend/src/components/charts/PiePercen: Custom Recharts label renderer placing percentage text inside pie slices, adapting size for mobile.
frontend/src/components/DailyDashboard.t: Renders date header (desktop-only) and tabbed daily sections for overview, activities, finance, habits, and journal. Switches content based on selected tab.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying the year with subtle styling and a top border.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, theme toggle, authentication status, and user dropdown. Handles login state, profile loading, and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login button integrated with Internet Identity, handling login attempts, disabled states, and stale-session recovery.
frontend/src/components/MainDashboard.ts: Displays the main dashboard with timeframe controls and multiple trend charts. Fetches and aggregates finance, habit, and activity data across recent days.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or updating a user's profile username. Submits profile data and shows loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/DailyOv: Shows a daily overview with activity, finance, habits, and journal charts. Computes daily metrics and renders responsive pie charts.
frontend/src/components/sections/Finance: Manages daily finance entries including creation and deletion, and displays a pie chart summary. Uses dialogs and form state for adding new finance items.
frontend/src/components/sections/HabitsS: Displays daily habits, allows creating, updating, deleting habits, and shows progress via a pie chart.
frontend/src/components/sections/Journal: Provides a daily journal editor with load, create, and update functionality tied to the selected date.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Manages time-based activities for a day, including creation, deletion, and duration calculation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reminde: Handles daily reminders with creation and deletion features through a modal interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Detects whether the viewport width is below the mobile breakpoint and updates on resize.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, activities, finances, and other backend data using an actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, color variables, dark mode overrides, and custom dashboard card styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes various error formats into consistent user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/localDate.ts: Implements local date formatting, parsing, manipulation, and range utilities that avoid timezone issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins based on CSS variables.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, including versioning, high-level app summary, and a list of implemented features with IDs, descriptions, and synonyms. Captures authentication, access control, user profile handling, URL-secret extraction, and date utility capabilities.
